divs: Sighting DetailsI went out to view the iss I have the app that tells you were and when to look. Just as I saw the iss this object that initially looked like a star started moving Towards the iss it was much brighter than the iss the object moved up on the iss Fast when it got up on the iss it did not stay with it long maybe 5 seconds Then it moved in the opposite direction I watched it cross the sky and it looked Like it just faded away like it really accelarated.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Burgaw
There were no other sightings in Burgaw on or around August 24th 2013
Summary: was viewing iss and ufo followed it
